library(ezRun)
library(cowplot)
library(SingleCellExperiment)

## debug
# input for this report: sceURLs, param
sceURLs <- c("wt_3_M"="https://fgcz-sushi.uzh.ch/projects/p2860/SCScran_37216_2019-06-08--10-10-39/wt_3_M_SCScran/00index.html",
             "wt_4_F"="https://fgcz-sushi.uzh.ch/projects/p2860/SCScran_37216_2019-06-08--10-10-39/wt_4_F_SCScran/00index.html")

sceList <- file.path("/srv/gstore/projects",
                     sub("https://fgcz-(gstore|sushi).uzh.ch/projects/", "",
                         dirname(sceURLs)))
sceList <- sapply(sceList, list.files, pattern="sce.*\\.rds", full.names=TRUE)
sceList <- lapply(sceList, readRDS)
names(sceList) <- names(sceURLs)
